channel.title: SQL on Maksim Tsiarokhin
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on Maksim Tsiarokhin

item.title: Get integer enum value
item.description: Replace SalesStatus with your enum: select t1.NAME, t2.ENUMID, t2.ENUMVALUE, t2.NAME EnumValueName from ENUMIDTABLE t1 join ENUMVALUETABLE t2 on t1.ID = t2.ENUMID where t1.NAME = 'SalesStatus'

item.title: Clear Dual-Write configuration after database restore
item.description: USE [AxDB] DELETE FROM [dbo].[DUALWRITEPROJECTCONFIGURATION] DELETE FROM [dbo].[DUALWRITEPROJECTFIELDCONFIGURATION] DELETE FROM [dbo].[BUSINESSEVENTSDEFINITION]
